description:
Sekijin and his underlings locate where Shouken has been kept hidden and steal away his body, trying to get it back to the Shouken family residence before his soul scatters and disappears. However, they are confronted by In Tetsu and the other youkai of Mount Ura giving Ki and Keika a chance to catch up. Sekijin sends Sashi on ahead with Shouken`s body but she is then stalled by Tanmoku Jiun as Shouken`s soul begins to scatter.
Source: crunchyroll
